name: Freemine Castle
description:
Life is a long and rocky road to conquer.
In the end, only the Freemine Zen Master can answer your questions, but only at a cost.
He lives high up in the clouds in his temple, waiting for his next challenger

Can you face the numerous challenges and emerge victorious from them or was it all for nothing?

Welcome to Freemine Castle, a game where you will try everything to gain even an inch of progress, but dont even know why you are trying so hard ?

What are you trying to achive here ? Fame? Glory? A way of passing some time? Or just a small laughter ?

Only the master will know.

Complete the challenges, climb to the top and claim your victory if you dare to see what comes next ...

Controls

Move: W,A,S,D

Spacebar: Jump

Left Shift: Sprint
